mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.test_no AS "testNo", a.priority_indicator AS "priorityIndicator", a.patient_id AS "patientId", a.visit_id AS "visitId", a.working_id AS "workingId", a.execute_date AS "executeDate", a.name AS "name", a.name_phonetic AS "namePhonetic", a.charge_type AS "chargeType", a.sex AS "sex", a.age AS "age", a.test_cause AS "testCause", a.relevant_clinic_diag AS "relevantClinicDiag", a.specimen AS "specimen", a.notes_for_spcm AS "notesForSpcm", a.spcm_received_date_time AS "spcmReceivedDateTime", a.spcm_sample_date_time AS "spcmSampleDateTime", a.requested_date_time AS "requestedDateTime", a.ordering_dept AS "orderingDept", a.ordering_provider AS "orderingProvider", a.performed_by AS "performedBy", a.result_status AS "resultStatus", a.results_rpt_date_time AS "resultsRptDateTime", a.transcriptionist AS "transcriptionist", a.verified_by AS "verifiedBy", a.costs AS "costs", a.charges AS "charges", a.billing_indicator AS "billingIndicator", a.print_indicator AS "printIndicator", a.subject AS "subject", a.container_carrier AS "containerCarrier", a.status AS "status", a.memo AS "memo", a.ward_code AS "wardCode", a.phyexam_flag AS "phyexamFlag", a.nayaotishi AS "nayaotishi", a.jianyi AS "jianyi", a.wsw AS "wsw", a.sampleid AS "sampleid", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.clinic_id AS clinicId, a.org_id AS orgId
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lab_test_master( id, test_no, priority_indicator, patient_id, visit_id, working_id, execute_date, name, name_phonetic, charge_type, sex, age, test_cause, relevant_clinic_diag, specimen, notes_for_spcm, spcm_received_date_time, spcm_sample_date_time, requested_date_time, ordering_dept, ordering_provider, performed_by, result_status, results_rpt_date_time, transcriptionist, verified_by, costs, charges, billing_indicator, print_indicator, subject, container_carrier, status, memo, ward_code, phyexam_flag, nayaotishi, jianyi, wsw, sampleid, del_flag, remarks, update_by, create_by, update_date, clinic_id, org_id, create_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{testNo}, #{priorityIndicator}, #{patientId}, #{visitId}, #{workingId}, #{executeDate}, #{name}, #{namePhonetic}, #{chargeType}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{testCause}, #{relevantClinicDiag}, #{specimen}, #{notesForSpcm}, #{spcmReceivedDateTime}, #{spcmSampleDateTime}, #{requestedDateTime}, #{orderingDept}, #{orderingProvider}, #{performedBy}, #{resultStatus}, #{resultsRptDateTime}, #{transcriptionist}, #{verifiedBy}, #{costs}, #{charges}, #{billingIndicator}, #{printIndicator}, #{subject}, #{containerCarrier}, #{status}, #{memo}, #{wardCode}, #{phyexamFlag}, #{nayaotishi}, #{jianyi}, #{wsw}, #{sampleid}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{clinicId}, #{orgId}, #{createDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE lab_test_master SET test_no = #{testNo}, priority_indicator = #{priorityIndicator}, patient_id = #{patientId}, visit_id = #{visitId}, working_id = #{workingId}, execute_date = #{executeDate}, name = #{name}, name_phonetic = #{namePhonetic}, charge_type = #{chargeType}, sex = #{sex}, age = #{age}, test_cause = #{testCause}, relevant_clinic_diag = #{relevantClinicDiag}, specimen = #{specimen}, notes_for_spcm = #{notesForSpcm}, spcm_received_date_time = #{spcmReceivedDateTime}, spcm_sample_date_time = #{spcmSampleDateTime}, requested_date_time = #{requestedDateTime}, ordering_dept = #{orderingDept}, ordering_provider = #{orderingProvider}, performed_by = #{performedBy}, result_status = #{resultStatus}, results_rpt_date_time = #{resultsRptDateTime}, transcriptionist = #{transcriptionist}, verified_by = #{verifiedBy}, costs = #{costs}, charges = #{charges}, billing_indicator = #{billingIndicator}, print_indicator = #{printIndicator}, subject = #{subject}, container_carrier = #{containerCarrier}, status = #{status}, memo = #{memo}, ward_code = #{wardCode}, phyexam_flag = #{phyexamFlag}, nayaotishi = #{nayaotishi}, jianyi = #{jianyi}, wsw = #{wsw}, sampleid = #{sampleid}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, clinic_id = #{clinicId}, org_id = #{orgId}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE lab_test_master SET del_flag = '1' WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE lab_test_master SET result_status = '1' WHERE id = #{id}
